description:
Learn Linux Ubuntu Server setup

Learn LAMP setup

Learn to install PHPmyadmin

Learn to setup and run Moodle

Have you ever thought, what knowledge do I need to host my own server?

This course will show you what it takes to become Moodle administrator and in few easy steps how you can use Linux to run your own server.

Linux is one of the most stable systems in the world and is totally free.

Do not get fooled by companies that tell you that you need bought hosting and experts to run your Moodle server.

Moodle hosting made easy makes you the expert. Great way to save money on licenses and support.

All the software used in this course is free.

I have designed the course using both video lectures and the I also have the Linux commands in written text. This makes this course easy to follow and understand. I will teach you the skills you need and if you follow the instructions you will have a secure setup of Moodle running in just few hours.

It does not matter if you are a teacher or if you are a technical person this course will help you better understand how Moodle works and why it is the most popular LMS system in the world.
title: Learn to Host Moodle with Linux
